name: CheckboxRoot
description: Root component of Checkbox that manages checked state. Renders a `<button>` element.

props.name: checked
props.description:
Whether the checkbox is currently ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description:
Whether the checkbox is initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox, use the `checked` prop instead.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Whether the checkbox is in a mixed state: neither ticked, nor unticked.

props.name: inputRef
props.description: A ref to access the hidden `<input>` element.

props.name: name
props.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

props.name: nativeButton
props.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `false` if the rendered element is not a button (e.g. `<div>`).

props.name: parent
props.description:
Whether the checkbox controls a group of child checkboxes.

Must be used in a [Checkbox Group](https://base-ui.com/react/components/checkbox-group).

props.name: readOnly
props.description: Whether the user should be unable to tick or untick the checkbox.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the componentâ€™s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: required
props.description: Whether the user must tick the checkbox before submitting a form.

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the selected checkbox.

props.name: invalid
props.description: Indicates whether the Checkbox is in an invalid state.

props.name: size
props.description: Determines the size of the Checkbox.
